reviews.review_msg: Brilliant professor,  in love with his skills such a great experience.

Clearly very passionate about linguistics, but this does lead him to ramble a bit, which can eat up some valuable lecture time. 3 midterms, no assignments, and no final exam. You will do better if you actually try to learn the material as best you can rather than just memorize it!

You'll definitely do well if you memorize both his midterm questions as well as his slides. Midterms are given so little time for that much question but as I said, as long as you memorize the whole thing you'll be fine.
